Articles.Content:
You're bordering on being mean now...

Looks great though!

I know. Well I did promise a release today but there are a few specific reasons that I want a few more days, it's not an open ended tease at this point there are a small number of known action items which need attending to and then it will be ready. I'm quite proud of it actually.
The capsules especially look great! Very clean, sharp, and high tech looking whilst remaining Kerbal-y.

I know. Well I did promise a release today but there are a few specific reasons that I want a few more days, it's not an open ended tease at this point there are a small number of known action items which need attending to and then it will be ready. I'm quite proud of it actually.

Take your time! We have been waiting this long and a few more days aren't going to kill us. I know I for one have been on you for a few months now about an update but as long as I know its coming soon I am happy. Its those times when you show us something and use the trademarked Soon instead of actually soon. At least we know now that its actually soon. So take your time and make it as good as we know it can be.

Take your time! We have been waiting this long and a few more days aren't going to kill us. I know I for one have been on you for a few months now about an update but as long as I know its coming soon I am happy. Its those times when you show us something and use the trademarked Soon instead of actually soon. At least we know now that its actually soon. So take your time and make it as good as we know it can be.

What you will get this week will be a full Beta 1 release focused on flight testing deep space and Duna exploration products, it's a giant leap forward from the last alpha. I think the craft file count is up to 20 with bonus subassemblies, and nearly every part, texture and flight system have been substantially improved from nose cone to nozzle.

The capsules especially look great! Very clean, sharp, and high tech looking whilst remaining Kerbal-y.

Thanks. What they really need is custom IVA's. After this update I'm going to focus on that.

Thanks. What they really need is custom IVA's. After this update I'm going to focus on that.

I'm sure Alexutas can help with that.
I think I might have something to do with that delay.

I think I might have something to do with that delay.

OH WE KNOW!

Of course we know it will be worth it, but don't worry we know its your fault.

OH WE KNOW!

Of course we know it will be worth it, but don't worry we know its your fault.

I already gave the models and configs exactly on Sunday. I met the deadline
lol no no no! 100% my fault and 0% blackheart haha

Haha, no need to catch my fault. Do you need the UV? I forgot to send it to you. Hang on, I'll link it here.

https://www.dropbox.com/s/8pei8hgm4w2cna8/ICPS.png?m=

Haha, no need to catch my fault. Do you need the UV? I forgot to send it to you. Hang on, I'll link it here.

https://www.dropbox.com/s/8pei8hgm4w2cna8/ICPS.png?m=

Oh thank you!

Flight Test Teaser

Oh thank you!

Flight Test Teaser

(awesome picture)

What is that behind the the LUS? An inflatable heat shield? A HUGE inflatable heat shield?

Yes, however it's not an upper stage, it's a lander assembly and a first stage (return to orbit)

Here at Chaka Monkey Exploration Systems, we put the Multi in MPCV

Yes, however it's not an upper stage, it's a lander assembly and a first stage (return to orbit)

Here at Chaka Monkey Exploration Systems, we put the Multi in MPCV

Kinda the MAV that was planned for the constellation program? Speaking of the constellation program, is it possible, not necessarily for this pack but in general to make fairings DRE compatible. I mean it would be really cool to use the fairings like in the constellation program as heat shields instead of inflatables.

Edited August 12, 2014 by sp1989

Kinda the MAV that was planned for the constellation program? Speaking of the constellation program, is it possible, not necessarily for this pack but in general to make fairings DRE compatible. I mean it would be really cool to use the fairings like in the constellation program as heat shields instead of inflatables.

Yeah actually I've always intended for the fairings to enter the atmosphere atop the inflatable to protect fragile payloads. The main reason for the large inflatable is to create drag in the thin Duna air... which is a weak point of the constellation style entry.

SLS Block I

New configuration

Lots of changes all around. I found out today that NASA has dropped the angled upper stage fairings and now they are straight up and down.

VERY special thanks to LandeTLS and Blackheart612 for helping in so many ways. It has really been a collaborative effort and I'm very excited about getting the Beta 1 release out to you guys later this week.

Edited August 13, 2014 by YANFRET
Where's the user with this sig?
Sir, I just want to point out the node placement of the ICPS engine is slightly off and you can see the fuel line going nowhere (you can edit the configs to fit)

Sir, I just want to point out the node placement of the ICPS engine is slightly off and you can see the fuel line going nowhere (you can edit the configs to fit)

Yeah he's right, the engine is a little to far down so the connection looks funny and the fuel pipe clips through the bottom tank and ends in one of the RCS containers
Yeah, and maybe the engine could b a little larger as well

Yeah, and maybe the engine could b a little larger as well

You are free to modify my models as you please for your pack only as long as Aerojet's name is credited so do whatever you want.

You are free to modify my models as you please for your pack only as long as Aerojet's name is credited so do whatever you want.

You have been very helpful and I'm looking forward to adding the Aerojet Kerbodyne logo to our materials

I wonder if you might consider adding red gass bottles to it after all... I think that would be a sweet signature feature of your product Line
Yeah, I will add it alright, But not as soon as possible

Yeah, I will add it alright, But not as soon as possible

And it will be just as nice when you do.
